text: geudeul-i malhadeola igeosdeul-eun geumgidoen gachug-iyo yangsig-ila uliga wonhaneun jadeul oeeneun amudo geugeos eul yangsig-eulo hal su eobsdoda tto geu deul-eun igeos-eun geumgidoen gachug-imae geu geos-ui deung-e jim-eul sidji malmyeo geu ga chug-eul dosalhamae halanim-ui ileum-eulo dosaldoeeoseoneun anidoenda hadeola geudeul-eun hananim-eul geojis-eulo geoyeogha ni geubunkkeseo god geudeul-eul geudeul-ui geo jisham-e daehan bosang-eul jusilila
